content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. As the landlord, I would like to ensure that I receive the highest possible rental price for the apartment. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is flexible and I am willing to negotiate.

I understand that the apartment is 25 square meters and I am willing to pay a fair and reasonable price for it.

I also understand that you want to receive the highest possible rental price for the apartment. I am willing to work together with you to find a mutually beneficial solution.

I hope that we can come to an agreement on the rental price that works best for both of us.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial solution. May I ask what your maximum budget is for renting the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My maximum budget is 500 Euros per month.

However, I am open to discussing a lower rental price if you have any suggestions or if it is possible for you to lower the price based on my dependability and responsibility.

I am also willing to sign a long-term lease if that would help you and us both.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for providing your maximum budget, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to discuss a lower rental price based on your dependability and responsibility. I would like to suggest a rental price of 450 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim.

In addition, I would be willing to consider a long-term lease of at least one year. This would provide stability for both of us and may help to lower the rental price over time.

I hope that we can come to an agreement on the rental price that works best for both of us. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine
